solution.text:
Cost of one book =Total cost \(\div\) Number of Books
\(\Rightarrow\) Cost of one book = Rs. \(\frac {_{{j*k}}_}{_{{k}}_}\)
Hence, Price of a single book= Rs. _{j}_

content.text: Raghav bought a certain number of books for Rs. _{{j*k}}_. If he bought _{k}_ books, What was the price of a single book?
